Termination: Either party may terminate this Agreement with thirty (30) days prior written notice.
Indemnity: Each party agrees to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the other party from any claims, damages, or liabilities.
Confidentiality: All confidential information shared under this Agreement shall not be disclosed to third parties without prior written consent.
Jurisdiction: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York.
Payment terms: Invoices shall be paid within thirty (30) days of receipt by the Client.
